title: Create Repair Invoice
description: Schema for validating repair invoice creation with automatic payment schedule generation.

driver_id.description: The primary key (ID) of the driver from the 'drivers' table.

lease_id.description: The primary key (ID) of the active lease from the 'leases' table.

vehicle_id.description: The primary key (ID) of the vehicle from the 'vehicles' table.

medallion_id.description: The primary key (ID) of the medallion from the 'medallions' table.

total_amount.description: Total repair cost/invoice amount (must be positive).

invoice_number.description: Invoice number from the repair vendor/workshop.

invoice_date.description: Date when the repair invoice was issued (ISO format: YYYY-MM-DD).

workshop_type.description: Type of workshop that performed the repair.

start_week.description: Start date for the repayment schedule (must be a Sunday in ISO format). Options: Current Payment Period or Next Payment Period.

preview_only.description: If true, only generates payment schedule preview without creating the invoice.

document_id.description: Optional ID of the uploaded repair invoice document.
